    • Method Detail

      • makeMove

        public java.lang.String makeMove(Player player,
                        java.lang.String msg)
        Gets a move from the ClientHandler and tests it. If the move is valid, the move is saved on the board. New Tiles are returned to
        Parameters:
        player - the player that made the move
        msg - the move itself
        Returns:
        new Tiles (in a String) if the method is valid or an Error

      • addToFirstMove

        public java.lang.String addToFirstMove(Player player,
                              java.lang.String msg)
        When a ClientHandler receives a firstmove from the client it is send here The move is tested and saved if it is valid
        Parameters:
        player - The player that made the firstmove
        msg - The firstmove
        Returns:
        Error if invalid move, true if everyone made their first move, false if not everyone made their first move.
